Headline: Eastbound #120 Ogilvie/Wacker Express Temporary Reroute near Ogilvie Station
ShortDescription: Eastbound 120 Ogilvie/Wacker Express buses are temporarily rerouted near Ogilvie Station.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #120 Ogilvie/Wacker Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Randolph, Clinton, Washington, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near Ogilvie Station.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted near Clark/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont, then resume their normal route on Clark, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #152 Addison Temporary Reroute at Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: 152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted near Clark/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Addison, Racine, Belmont, Halsted, then resume their normal route on Addison, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

Allow extra travel time.
